title: World Series Game 6: Los Angeles Dodgers v Toronto Blue Jays – live updates
summary: The Toronto Blue Jays face off against the Los Angeles Dodgers in Game 6 of the World Series. The game is being covered live by David Lengel. Stay updated on all the action as it unfolds.

title: New Zealand v England: third men’s cricket one-day international – live
summary: In Wellington, the third ODI between New Zealand and England is underway, with live updates provided by our writers. Fans can follow the match's progression through an over-by-over report. Exciting developments and key moments are highlighted as the teams compete.

title: History secured: There is no telling where the record-breaking Roos’ AFLW dominance will end I Nino Bucci
summary: North Melbourne has set a record by winning 24 consecutive games, the highest in VFL/AFL/AFLW history. The team's focus is now on achieving back-to-back premierships. This milestone highlights their dominance in the league.

title: Nationals members vote to ditch net zero target from party platform
summary: The Nationals are set to formalize a policy position that diverges from their senior Coalition partner during a partyroom meeting on Sunday morning. This meeting will address key differences in their approaches. The divergence reflects ongoing tensions within the Coalition regarding certain policy issues.

title: Trump news at a glance: Friday rulings hamper administration on food stamps, voting access
summary: On October 31, President Trump faced three significant legal challenges, marking a difficult day for him in the courts. These setbacks are part of ongoing legal battles that could impact his political future. Analysts are closely watching the implications of these rulings as the 2024 election approaches.
